original_title: Litro to reduce cooking gas prices
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The price of a 12.5 kg cooking gas cylinder will be reduced by at least Rs. 1,000/- with effect from midnight on Tuesday (4).
The exact price revision is expected to be announced on Tuesday (4).
